StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
I am a UI architect and a full-stack developer with architect-level experience of designing and developing web and mobile based applications. I have experience with all of the layers (database, business rules and presentation) but specialize in the presentation layer--both the client and server sides and the effective integration of the two. I work primarily with JavaScript (including technologies like HTML5, CSS3, Object Oriented JavaScript, AngularJS, and Angular 2.0/7.0 with TypeScript.js, Polymer.js, Vue.js, ember.js, Jasmine, LESS/SAAS, Twitter Bootstrap, D3.js, GULP, AJAX, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB). I have experience developing frameworks and accelerators with app deployment and publishing exposure. Good knowledge on security capabilities like SSL, Client certificates, Basic Authentication, OAuth2 and OpenID. Familiarity with Touch Interfaces, Mobile Gesture Support, responsive designs, Usage Statistics and AJAX Server Integration (JSON, web sockets..) and interaction with different kinds of back-end service application development paradigms, memory management, file I/O, Concurrency handling, app-level security, location services, and multi-threading. Have proven experience of leading architects and working with program delivery leads. Have excellent written and verbal communication, interpersonal qualities, leadership skills, and ability to translate technology into business language.
Primary Responsibilities:
• Hands-on coding experience of MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, Angular 7.0, Node.js), AngularJS, Polymer.js, Vue.js. • Single point of contact for customer and senior management for any project related matters • Responsible for client success by ensuring right solution delivered in planned time, and project success by ensuring in time and in budget delivery • Work closely with client representatives in different countries • Coordination with global and cross-functional teams across different countries • Provide technical management and mentorship to development team • Capturing project requirements, creating functional and technical design document • Effort estimation, spring planning, attaining customer sign-off • Establishing best practices for development and implementation of software project and ensuring compliance to the same, in the areas of coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, release process.
Secondary Responsibilities:
• Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and high-performance applications • Deliver projects and products using the appropriate agile project management methodology, learning & iterating frequently • Work with the Product Manager to define the roadmap for any given product and translate this into user stories • Lead the collaborative, dynamic planning process - prioritising the work that needs to be done against the capacity and capability of the team • Matrix-managing a multidisciplinary team • Ensure all products are built to an appropriate level of quality for the stage (alpha/beta/production) Actively participating in the Delivery Manager community, sharing and re-applying skills and knowledge and bringing in best practice.

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. UI Designer / Web Developer (Sr. Associate)

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedTitle: Senior UI Designer Web Developer Senior Associate

PositionHistory.Title: Research Editor
PositionHistory.Description:
URL: http://www.sisinfotech.com
Project #15: Project Title: Member Discovery Engine (MDE) Technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, Angular.js, Node.js (MEAN)
URL: http://map.searshc.com/map/#/apps
Description: Member Tool that allows the user to dynamically search, explore, and identify opportunities within our total member population. This tool holds billions of data points and thousands of attributes. MDE is designed with quick response time on population sizing and give the flexibility to change logic in customized populations. The sales for each individual member are also displayed in the tool and can be ranked on multiple metrics with an export and saving capability.
Project #14: Project Title: Member Performance Scorecard (MPS) Technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, Angular.js, Node.js (MEAN)
URL: http://map.searshc.com/map/#/apps
Description: Performance Measurement Tool that displays Format / SHC results in different time frames and different view of the data. This platform divides the data in multiple tiles for the user flexibility to provide insights to the performance of the business along with discovery opportunities. Quick performance of this platform allows the user to view data quickly and easily through designated drill path combinations.
Project #13: Project Title: MPS Advanced Export - Database Fetch Technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, Angular.js, Node.js (MEAN)
URL: http://map.searshc.com/map/#/apps
Description: Database Fetch is a simple and easy way to pull data quickly from the Member Performance Scorecard. This allows the user to pull from the source data and history data that is no longer displayed in MPS.
Project #12: Project Title: Member Discovery Engine (MDE) Technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, Angular.js, Node.js (MEAN)
URL: http://map.searshc.com/map/#/apps
Description: Member Tool that allows the user to dynamically search, explore, and identify opportunities within our total member population. This tool holds billions of data points and thousands of attributes. MDE is designed with quick response time on population sizing and give the flexibility to change logic in customized populations. The sales for each individual member is also displayed in the tool and can be ranked on multiple metrics with an export and saving capability.
Project #11: Project Title: Employee QuickView Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Angular.js 2.0, Typescript, Bootstrap 3.0, GIT, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Gulp, Browserify.
URL: https://qtalentanalytics.deloitte.com
Description: Employee QuickView (EQV) is a unique analytics platform that integrates and automates the entire workforce management into a one-stop business information system. EQV has twenty well-defined modules that can track, optimize and streamline every aspect of Headcount Management. EQV manages every single process of your Organization helping you manage mission critical operations. Each module has a comprehensible dashboard, simple & straightforward UI and most importantly customizable reports.
Project #10: Project Title: Headcount Management Summary View (HM Summary view)
Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, JSX, Redux.js, JavaScript Design Patterns, Bootstrap 3.0, GIT, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Gulp, Browserify, WebPack.
URL: https://qtalentanalytics.deloitte.com/headcount
Description: HM Summary View provides a comprehensive Staffing Support Solution Package that handles all the staffing firms back office needs.
Project #12: Project Title: Lucas Systems (AMD) Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Angular.js, Angular UI Bootstrap, Angular Router UI, UI-Grid, Restangular, Jasmine, Protractor, Bootstrap 3.0, JIRA, GIT, BitBucket, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, & MangoDB.
URL: http://lucas-amd-dev.elasticbeanstalk.com/app/index.html#/
Description: Lucas Systems is the leading provider of mobile work execution solutions for distribution logistics. We developed software for Lucas Systems called Lucas AMD. Lucas AMD is a web-based management dashboard that gives supervisors and managers real-time visibility into their operations, exceptions, associate productivity, and workflow, as well as powerful tools to manage mobile work execution by workers using Jennifer Mobile applications on the warehouse floor. Lucas AMD also lets managers configure how they view information to suit their needs and preferences. And since supervisors today need to be as mobile as their workers, they can access Lucas AMD on tablets, smart phones and other mobile devices.
Project #9: Project Title: MobileMatrics Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, AngularJS, Angular UI Bootstrap, Angular Router UI, UI-Grid, Restangular, Bootstrap 3.0, Node.js, Express.js, NoSQL, SQLite3, PhoneGap, Cordava, D3.js, NVD3.js.
URL: http://pmimemobile.chaindata.com/
Description: MobileMatrics is a data ware house data analytics web application; it's a web-based data analytics dashboard, where you can generate and view high level business reports. You can query data based on metrics like, time, volume and category and perform various business intelligence operations.
Project #8: Project Title: Gieco Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, AngularJS, Angular UI, Angular Router UI, UI-Grid, RestAngular, Bootstrap 3.0, TFS, MVC, SQL Server.
URL: https://www.geico.com/
Description: Gieco is an Insurance company; we have developed many products for Gieco. Users can create or check the status of their insurance. We develop products for various types of Insurances like Vehicle, Property and Business insurances.
Project #8: Project Title: Edelman TrustBarometer 2011 Mobile site
Technologies: XHTML, CSS, Javascript, .Net, XML, Mobile Simulators
URL: http://www.edelman.mobi/trust2011
Description: It's a website which can be access using mobile phones (BlackBerry, IPhone, etc.). Its a mobile version of an existing site http://www.edelman.com/trust/2011/. I planned the complete architecture and designed the layouts and the converted the layouts into XHTML/CSS which is cross-browser compatible (IE8, Firefox) and also on mobile phones like Blackberry, & IPhone, MicroMax Q7).
Project #7: Project Title: Executive Summary Report
Technologies: XHTML, HTML5, CSS2/ CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, JSON
URL: https://executive-summary-report.googlecode.com/files/esr-v3.zip
http://executive-summary-report.googlecode.com/git-history/fe711fc6e628fda2fd007c157911964775f0573c/ExecutiveSummaryReport/index.html
Description: Executive Summary Report is a tool to grade a list of websites based on factors like:
● Month-Over-Month (MoM) organic traffic ● Year-Over-Year (YoY) organic traffic ● Top keywords and their positions in Search Engines ● Various SEO Factors.
My Responsibility: I used a MVC concept here and retrieved all the data in Javascript arrays and JSON formats from Google Analytics and from the database and then did all the front-end programming to calculate the final grades and to display the information.
Project # 6: Project Title: Edelman Widget
Technologies: HTML/CSS, Flash, Flex, PHP, MySQL, XML URL: http://widget.edelman.com/
Description: It's a widget to post articles and comments. It has an admin panel through which an administrator can add and maintain articles. The users can read the articles and then they can add comments to them. The users can share this widget on their websites. It is developed using HTML/CSS, Flash ActionScripting, Flex and PHP/MySQL. The PHP generates the XML files by retrieving data form MySQL and the Flash ActionScripting displays the information in the widget.
Project # 5: Technologies: Photoshop, Flash Actionscripting
Description: Below listed URLs have some flash components which I developed that can be used on any web page.
URLs: http://cms12345678.appspot.com/file/ubsflash/triage.swf http://cms12345678.appspot.com/file/ubsflash/experienced_01.swf http://www.ubs.com/1/e/career_candidates/flash.html
Project # 4: Technologies: Flash Actionscripting
URL: http://cms12345678.appspot.com/file/ubsflash/homepage_2.swf
Description: Below is a flash website, I designed only the home page and the navigation. The site is still under construction. Hope you appreciate the look and feel of this site.
Project # 3: Technology: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Flash Actionscripting
URL: http://financialservicesinc.ubs.com/wealth/Home.html
Description: It is a Flash interactive navigation site. It has some static pages and on home page it has a flash component which has some options and View Results button, based on the options selection it will open a particular page.
Project # 2: Technologies: Flash, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, XML
URL: http://www.ubs.com/1/e/career_candidates/mba/video.html
Description: It is a video podcast site. It has a collection of .flv files which are played in Flash based video player. In this project I developed a video player using ActionScripting and search or filter functionality using JavaScript, JQuery and XML. All the .FLV, images and thumbnails are stored on hosting space and the information such as .flv files path, thumbnails path are stored in an excel file and using JQuery and XML I read the data and displayed the videos in Flash Player and the data on web page.
Project # 1: Below are some more flash websites I designed:
http://karmanyc.net/ http://www.gomez-ramirezcpa.com/ http://www.aemcomputers.com/ http://thefamilyunitpg.com/

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 58% of this job

Degree.Comments: Higher Diploma Software Engineering Aptech Computer Education. Diploma in Graphic Designing Arena Multimedia

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Primary Software Skills: Web programming: ● HTML5 / CSS3, SAAS & LESS ● Object Oriented JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, & JSON ● AngularJS 1.5, Angular UI Route, Angular UI Bootstrap, Underscore.js. ● AngularJS 7.0, Typescript, Babel, WebPack ● Media Queries ● Twitter Bootstrap 3.0, 4.0 ● Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose.js, socket.io, lodash.js, etc. ● Gulp, Jasmine, Protractor. ● D3.js, NVD3.js ● MongoDB, NoSQL ● Google Cloud Platform, Google BigQiery SQL
Domains:
Worked on various domains like Banking, Insurance, Logistics, Ecommerce, Analytics, Software, Mobile, HRMS, etc.
Secondary Software Skills: Web programming: ● HTML/CSS ● Material Design with Polymer ● CSS Reset / Normalize.css ● Polymer.js, Polymer App Toolbox ● React.js, JSX, Redus.js, Relay.js ● JQuery (JQGrid, CSS, Effects), JQuery Templates, JQuery Libraries, MVC, MVVM, JQuery Mobile, YUI ● JavaScript Framework: JQuery UI, JQuery Mobile UI, Kendo UI, Knockout.js, Backbone.js, Breeze.js, require.js, Underscore.js, Ember.js, io.js, ES6.js, prototypes.js, JQPlot.js, D3.js, NVD3.js, PhoneGap, Cordava, Sencha Ext JS, AngularJS, TypeScript, Jasmine Test Specs ● Design Patterns (Constructor Pattern, Module Pattern, Singleton Pattern, Observer Pattern, Prototype Pattern, Command Pattern, Facade Pattern, Factory Pattern, Timer Pattern) ● XML (DTD, XSLT, XPath) ● CMS (Joomla, Drupal, WordPress, Moodle) ● Google APIs, Google Analytics, Omniture, Google Map APIs
Web Tools: ● Adobe Photoshop CS5 ● Balsamiq
Programming languages: ● C, C++ ● PHP/MySQL ● Windows Azure Cloud Service ● VisualStudio 2015, TFS ● OSCommerce, CodeIgniter, CakePHP, Megento Tools ● Eclipse, WebStrom, Atom, Sublime ● GIT, GITHub, bitBucket, JIRA, TFS
DBMS: ● SQL Server, MYSQL
E-Learning ● Flash ● ActionScript 3.0

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
Goverdhan Koyalkar Mobile: 9148782904 Skype id: Goverdhan.k Email address: goverdhan.k@gmail.Com
Summary:
I am a UI architect and a full-stack developer with architect-level experience of designing and developing web and mobile based applications. I have experience with all of the layers (database, business rules and presentation) but specialize in the presentation layer--both the client and server sides and the effective integration of the two. I work primarily with JavaScript (including technologies like HTML5, CSS3, Object Oriented JavaScript, AngularJS, and Angular 2.0/7.0 with TypeScript.js, Polymer.js, Vue.js, ember.js, Jasmine, LESS/SAAS, Twitter Bootstrap, D3.js, GULP, AJAX, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB). I have experience developing frameworks and accelerators with app deployment and publishing exposure. Good knowledge on security capabilities like SSL, Client certificates, Basic Authentication, OAuth2 and OpenID. Familiarity with Touch Interfaces, Mobile Gesture Support, responsive designs, Usage Statistics and AJAX Server Integration (JSON, web sockets..) and interaction with different kinds of back-end service application development paradigms, memory management, file I/O, Concurrency handling, app-level security, location services, and multi-threading. Have proven experience of leading architects and working with program delivery leads. Have excellent written and verbal communication, interpersonal qualities, leadership skills, and ability to translate technology into business language.
Primary Responsibilities:
• Hands-on coding experience of MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, Angular 7.0, Node.js), AngularJS, Polymer.js, Vue.js. • Single point of contact for customer and senior management for any project related matters • Responsible for client success by ensuring right solution delivered in planned time, and project success by ensuring in time and in budget delivery • Work closely with client representatives in different countries • Coordination with global and cross-functional teams across different countries • Provide technical management and mentorship to development team • Capturing project requirements, creating functional and technical design document • Effort estimation, spring planning, attaining customer sign-off • Establishing best practices for development and implementation of software project and ensuring compliance to the same, in the areas of coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, release process.
Secondary Responsibilities:
• Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and high-performance applications • Deliver projects and products using the appropriate agile project management methodology, learning & iterating frequently • Work with the Product Manager to define the roadmap for any given product and translate this into user stories • Lead the collaborative, dynamic planning process - prioritising the work that needs to be done against the capacity and capability of the team • Matrix-managing a multidisciplinary team • Ensure all products are built to an appropriate level of quality for the stage (alpha/beta/production) Actively participating in the Delivery Manager community, sharing and re-applying skills and knowledge and bringing in best practice.
Primary Software Skills: Web programming: ● HTML5 / CSS3, SAAS & LESS ● Object Oriented JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, & JSON ● AngularJS 1.5, Angular UI Route, Angular UI Bootstrap, Underscore.js. ● AngularJS 7.0, Typescript, Babel, WebPack ● Media Queries ● Twitter Bootstrap 3.0, 4.0 ● Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose.js, socket.io, lodash.js, etc. ● Gulp, Jasmine, Protractor. ● D3.js, NVD3.js ● MongoDB, NoSQL ● Google Cloud Platform, Google BigQiery SQL
Domains:
Worked on various domains like Banking, Insurance, Logistics, Ecommerce, Analytics, Software, Mobile, HRMS, etc.
Secondary Software Skills: Web programming: ● HTML/CSS ● Material Design with Polymer ● CSS Reset / Normalize.css ● Polymer.js, Polymer App Toolbox ● React.js, JSX, Redus.js, Relay.js ● JQuery (JQGrid, CSS, Effects), JQuery Templates, JQuery Libraries, MVC, MVVM, JQuery Mobile, YUI ● JavaScript Framework: JQuery UI, JQuery Mobile UI, Kendo UI, Knockout.js, Backbone.js, Breeze.js, require.js, Underscore.js, Ember.js, io.js, ES6.js, prototypes.js, JQPlot.js, D3.js, NVD3.js, PhoneGap, Cordava, Sencha Ext JS, AngularJS, TypeScript, Jasmine Test Specs ● Design Patterns (Constructor Pattern, Module Pattern, Singleton Pattern, Observer Pattern, Prototype Pattern, Command Pattern, Facade Pattern, Factory Pattern, Timer Pattern) ● XML (DTD, XSLT, XPath) ● CMS (Joomla, Drupal, WordPress, Moodle) ● Google APIs, Google Analytics, Omniture, Google Map APIs
Web Tools: ● Adobe Photoshop CS5 ● Balsamiq
Programming languages: ● C, C++ ● PHP/MySQL ● Windows Azure Cloud Service ● VisualStudio 2015, TFS ● OSCommerce, CodeIgniter, CakePHP, Megento Tools ● Eclipse, WebStrom, Atom, Sublime ● GIT, GITHub, bitBucket, JIRA, TFS
DBMS: ● SQL Server, MYSQL
E-Learning ● Flash ● ActionScript 3.0
Certifications:
Microsoft Certified Professional (Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3) Microsoft Certified Professional (Designing ASP.NET 4.5 MVC Web Applications) Microsoft Certified Professional (Windows Azure)
Educational Qualifications: Qualification University M.C.A Osmania University B.Sc. Computers Osmania University Higher Diploma Software Engineering Aptech Computer Education. Diploma in Graphic Designing Arena Multimedia
Experience: I have 14 years of experience as a frontend developer worked with following companies: Company: Deloitte - 1st March 2016 to Till date
Designation: Delivery Manager (Sr. Architect MEAN stack)

Company: AccionLabs - 2nd Jan 2014 to Feb 2016
Designation: Principal Consultant (UI Architect)

Designation: UI Engineer (Team Lead)
URL: http://www.hitachiconsulting.com

Description: It is a video podcast site. It has a collection of .flv files which are played in Flash based video player. In this project I developed a video player using ActionScripting and search or filter functionality using JavaScript, JQuery and XML. All the .FLV, images and thumbnails are stored on hosting space and the information such as .flv files path, thumbnails path are stored in an excel file and using JQuery and XML I read the data and displayed the videos in Flash Player and the data on web page.
Project # 1: Below are some more flash websites I designed:
http://karmanyc.net/ http://www.gomez-ramirezcpa.com/ http://www.aemcomputers.com/ http://thefamilyunitpg.com/
Personal Details:
Father Name: K. Dayanand Chowdhary Address: 14-2-64 Goshamahal, Chandanwadi, Hyderbad - 500012 Sd/- (Goverdhan Koyalkar)

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Goverdhan Koyalkar's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly User Interface) and slightly concentrated in User Experience (mostly Web Design). Goverdhan Koyalkar has 16 years of work experience, with 7 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a mid-level management role: Delivery Manager Starting on 3/1/2016, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 3 years and 9 months: Title: Delivery Manager for Deloitte - 1st Starting on 7/1/2012, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 15 months: Title: UI / UX Developer (Team Lead) for Applied Information Science India Pvt. Ltd Starting on 6/1/2010, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 18 months: Title: UI Engineer (Team Lead) for Hitachi Consulting

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:311;] The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include the candidate's contact info at the top of the resume.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Primary Software Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;4] The following section does not have the header on a separate line: 'Experience'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.
